Control Name: 1.8.2 Hub and spoke design pricing is understood.
Control Statement: Virtual WAN has costs that are different in hub and spoke design. The cost of the peering network or other service routing has to be included. If Private Link is deployed, peering is not billed - only private link.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 1.8 How do you manage networking costs for this workload?
